txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Dancing in the Dark

The power of Shadow is one of the greatest strengths the Enemy possesses. Saruman has harnessed this power and given it to his apprentice in the form of a ring. The sooner you defeat the apprentice, the faster that threat is removed.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 in the Shadow wing of the Tower of Orthanc Raid.</rgb>
Complete Challenge: Dancing in the Dark
